channel.title: CVE Feed for NUUO -- NUUO CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NUUO -- NUUO CMS

item.title: CVE-2018-17894|2024-08-05T11:01:14.643Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20cms
item.description: NUUO CMS all versions 3.1 and prior, The application creates default accounts that have hard-coded passwords, which could allow an attacker to gain privileged access.

item.title: CVE-2018-17888|2024-08-05T11:01:14.481Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20cms
item.description: NUUO CMS all versions 3.1 and prior, The application uses a session identification mechanism that could allow attackers to obtain the active session ID, which could allow arbitrary remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-17890|2024-08-05T11:01:14.699Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20cms
item.description: NUUO CMS all versions 3.1 and prior, The application uses insecure and outdated software components for functionality, which could allow arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-17892|2024-08-05T11:01:14.548Z -- nuuo -- nuuo%20cms
item.description: NUUO CMS all versions 3.1 and prior, The application implements a method of user account control that causes standard account security features to not be utilized as intended, which could allow user account compromise and may allow for remote code execution.
